<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Control what the unit(s) is/are looking at (target or [[Position]]). If target is used, it will get revealed fully.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit(s) '''lookAt''' position

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit(s): [[Object]] or [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> position: [[Object]] or [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> _someSoldier '''lookAt''' _otherSoldier </code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code> [_someSoldier, _otherSoldier] '''lookAt''' [[markerPos]] "markerOne" </code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value><code>[[hint]] "R U N !";
BFG = "B_AAA_System_01_F" [[createVehicle]] [[position]] [[player]];
[[createVehicleCrew]] BFG;
t = [[time]] + 10;
[[onEachFrame]]
{
	BFG [[lookAt]] ([[unitAimPosition]] [[player]] [[vectorAdd]] ([[velocity]] [[player]] [[vectorMultiply]] 0.2));
	[[if]] ([[time]] > t && [[alive]] [[player]]) [[then]]
	{
		[BFG,"weapon_Cannon_Phalanx",[0]] [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_fire]];
	};
};</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[glanceAt]], [[commandWatch]], [[doWatch]], [[freeLook]]
</value></part></template>
